headline: Textile Testing Equipment Market Outlook 2025-2029: Sustainable Fibers & Automation Propel Textile Testing Equipment Advances
summary: Textile testing equipment market to grow by USD 390.6M from 2024-2029 at a 4.6% CAGR. Driven by demand for technical textiles, non-woven fabrics, and APAC's textile surge, the report analyzes market size, trends, and key vendors like AMETEK, TUV SUD, and SGS SA.
